DOC.brief_summary: This trial investigate effect several dos FE 999049 woman undergo IVF/ICSI ( in-vitro fertilisation/intracytoplasmic sperm injection ) treatment .
DOC.brief_title: A Dose-response Trial Using rFSH FE 999049 Women Undergoing IVF/ICSI Treatment
DOC.criteria: Women diagnose tubal infertility , unexplained infertility , infertility relate endometriosis stage I/II partner diagnose male factor infertility Women eligible IVF ( invitro fertilisation ) and/or ICSI ( intracytoplasmic sperm injection ) treatment Women age 1837 year Women body mass index ( BMI ) 18.532.0 kg/m2 Women polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) associate anovulation , endometriosis stage III/IV Women history recurrent miscarriage Women contraindication control ovarian stimulation gonadotropin Women three control ovarian stimulation cycle
